author: arnetheduck
content: I saw https://github.com/libp2p/specs/blob/marco/partial-messages/pubsub/gossipsub/partial-messages.md just now which made me curious  - this does not at all look like something that libp2p needs to concern itself - ie it looks very "application-specific" and looks like it could ostensibly be solved in the ethereum spec instead - is there some relevant background to read? cc <@106441459183423488> <@857052906495017000>

author: marcopolo__
content: linked in the post, but here's the consensus specs draft PR: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4558. I'll write an EIP soon as well.
